content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 15: The Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA) has requested the concerned persons to return the office items that were looted from the CIAA Office and its offices outside the Kathmandu Valley in course of September 9 protest. The CIAA requested the return of the loot at Police

title: CIAA urges return of loot
